name: Duality (itch) (JakeRebadaviaXD)
description:
You are a delivery person that also fantasizes that he delivers stuff for people in a different time. Totally normal. Can you optimize your real job and your imaginary one?

This is Duality

The goal is to deliver packages/crates to their specific hut/house.  But if you focus solely on one side, you might lose your sense of realism or imagination which cause you in a downward spiral where you don't have the capability to dual wield jobs anymore. (Yes, this game is darker than it sounds)This is an entry in the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 with the theme "It is not real".

*Controls may be a bit floaty. (Some consider it a programming error but I think it's a challenge to the players)
